4 subrețele -> 2 biti -- 00 01 10 11

17.18.19.0/24 ----- 00010001.00010010.000100|11.00000000/24

/24 + 2 biti = /26 => 2^6 - 2 = 62 statii fiecare

Cele 4 subrețele vor avea, respectiv adresele:

00010001.00010010.000100|11.00000000/26 -> 17.18.19.0/26
00010001.00010010.000100|11.01000000/26 -> 17.18.19.64/26
00010001.00010010.000100|11.10000000/26 -> 17.18.19.128/26
00010001.00010010.000100|11.11000000/26 -> 17.18.19.192/26

Adresa de broadcast a fiecărei subrețele va fi, respectiv:

00010001.00010010.000100|11.00111111/26 -> 17.18.19.63/26
00010001.00010010.000100|11.01111111/26 -> 17.18.19.127/26
00010001.00010010.000100|11.10111111/26 -> 17.18.19.191/26
00010001.00010010.000100|11.11111111/26 -> 17.18.19.255/26

Prima adresă asignabilă din cadrul fiecărei subrețele va fi, respectiv:

00010001.00010010.000100|11.00000001/26 -> 17.18.19.1/26
00010001.00010010.000100|11.01000001/26 -> 17.18.19.65/26
00010001.00010010.000100|11.10000001/26 -> 17.18.19.129/26
00010001.00010010.000100|11.11000001/26 -> 17.18.19.193/26

Ultima adresă asignabilă din cadrul fiecărei subrețele va fi, respectiv:

00010001.00010010.000100|11.00111110/26 -> 17.18.19.62/26
00010001.00010010.000100|11.01111110/26 -> 17.18.19.126/26
00010001.00010010.000100|11.10111110/26 -> 17.18.19.190/26
00010001.00010010.000100|11.11111110/26 -> 17.18.19.254/26
